RelatedSentence: Ray Bradbury 's home of more than 50 years , where he did much of his writing , is on the market in Cheviot Hills at $ 1.495 million .
The traditional home , built in 1937 , features vaulted ceilings , a brick fireplace in the living room , wainscoting and crown molding .
A two - car garage faces the street , and there are front and back lawns .
